Class Theme ¶

Synopsis

Attributes
back

iColor the background color, whats below everything
moduleOutline

iColor the outline of the visual modules in the hud editor
moduleOverlay

iColor the overlay on top of the visual modules in the hud editor
darkbutton

iColor most buttons use "enabled" but some use darkbutton's color instead
text

iColor color of the text on the ui
largeArea

iColor color of the body of a window/pannel
titlebar

iColor color of the titlebar
disabled

iColor color of disabled stuff
enabled

iColor color of enabled stuff, can be used as accent color
blocked

iColor blocked content in that color
Theme.back ¶

iColor the background color, whats below everything

Theme.moduleOutline ¶

iColor the outline of the visual modules in the hud editor

Theme.moduleOverlay ¶

iColor the overlay on top of the visual modules in the hud editor

Theme.darkbutton ¶

iColor most buttons use "enabled" but some use darkbutton's color instead

Theme.text ¶

iColor color of the text on the ui

Theme.largeArea ¶

iColor color of the body of a window/pannel

Theme.titlebar ¶

iColor color of the titlebar

Theme.disabled ¶

iColor color of disabled stuff

Theme.enabled ¶

iColor color of enabled stuff, can be used as accent color

Theme.blocked ¶

iColor blocked content in that color
